resources.string:
ॐ तत् सत्। Shall we update your Stardict dictionary files? (Details: http://bit.ly/dict-update-app ) 
 This program downloads latest dictionary files from the internet, and stores it in the SDCARD/dictdata folder, for Stardict apps to use. 
 (This is only a dictionary updater software. You NEED some Stardict-compatible dictionary utility (Eg: ebdic [Rated high], ColorDict, GoldenDict, GoldenDict paid …) separately.) 
 Please scroll + select the dictionary lists you want to use, then click the button.
!!!Don\'t navigate away or we\'ll need to restart!!!
"Added %d dictionary-urls. Pick the dictionaries to install."
We\'re done!! Get a stardict-compatible dictionary app (eg: ebdic [Rated high], Goldendict paid, ColorDict), if you don\'t already have one. Then reindex all your dictionaries.
\n Do you want to try again?
Installing dictionaries. Please wait. \n !!Don\'t navigate away or we\'ll have to restart.!!\n
Alert: Connected, but not on Wifi.
No data connection. Please retry later.
